text: My Son () is a 1928 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov.«Мой сын» сбежал из архиваМой сын (1928) It stars Gennadiy Michurin, Anna Sten, and Pyotr Berezov. ==Actors== * Gennadiy Michurin as Andrey Surin * Anna Sten as Olga Surina * Pyotr Berezov as Gregor * Lyudmila Semyonova as Neighbour * Nikolay Cherkasov as Pat * Boris Chirkov as Patashon == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1928 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Chervyakov
title: My Son (1928 movie)
